page.title: 14MEMORIES! (1)
page.content: We interviewed an old lady who has lived in Witham for 81 yrs.She was born in Grove Cottages and has lived in Church St. since 1939.When she went there, there were no bathrooms and they had coal fires. There are still a few of the old shops left,but there were more shops then than there are now.You could get every thing you wanted in Witham.Some of the Roads are the same now, but Witham has grown a lot bigger now a days. She went to All Saints Church School (now Howbridge CofE Junior School).The other schools were the Board Schools in Maldon Road and Chipping Hill.There werea lot more fields then than there are now. There is just one person left who she has known all her life - and that is her brother.
